markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Death Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=3462) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 25</row>

**Archetype** [Hallowed Necromancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=172)

**Prerequisites**
[Hallowed Necromancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3459)

</column>

---

With your intimate familiarity with the duality of positive and negative energy, you're able to stand as a bulwark against death and undeath alike. You gain resistance to negative damage equal to half your level and a +1 status bonus to saving throws against effects with the [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) trait.
name: Death Warden
